mapper.select: SELECT s.order_no, order_detail_no, vend_nm, pro_nm, order_cnt, parrd_dt, order_dt FROM order_sheet s, order_detail d WHERE s.order_no = d.order_no AND order_sit_detail = '준비중' ORDER BY parrd_dt

SELECT pro_cd, pro_lot_no, lot_cnt, (SELECT pro_nm FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = p.pro_cd ) AS "pro_nm" , pro_exp, pro_wdt FROM pro_stc p WHERE (SELECT pro_nm FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = p.pro_cd )=#{proNm}
AND lot_cnt > 0 GROUP BY pro_ist_no,pro_cd,pro_lot_no,lot_cnt,pro_exp, pro_wdt ORDER BY pro_wdt
SELECT pro_cd, pro_lot_no, pro_oust_dt, pro_oust_cnt FROM pro_oust WHERE TO_CHAR(pro_oust_dt, 'yyyyMMdd') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd')
